website_summaries.verdict: These 6 in. lights will carry you through from dusk to dawn, boasting a 12 hr., fade-free runtime.
pros: Consistent light for 12 hr., all with compounds that are nontoxic and nonflammable
Shelf life of at least 2 yr
cons: Lights may not last quite as long as advertised

customer_reviews.title: THESE are by far"THE BEST GLOW STICK" have ever used
customer_reviews.text: THESE are by far"THE BEST GLOW STICK" have ever used. Lasted 28 hrs, granted, by last 12 hrs very faint light...but if in situation WITH NO LIGHTS, still very helpful. Otherwise, normal brightness is about 12-18 hrs! Than hours down to 40% & finally 5-8% at the last 5-8 hrs....Again that's normal. Using these in emergency situations, making location in cave exploring, camping, etc... Best ever used, & comes with wire to tie around neck, on objects, etc as well as end has a hook. Well definitely keep ordering. I order the white light! Cheers, LiteKid
customer_reviews.author: LiteKid

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy...read
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand is about 75% of the intensity of the more well-known brand. After 1 1/2 hours the intensity dropped to less than half. Less than half is intensity barely enough to read more than a few lines in a magazine without having to move the light. I do not recommend these if you need even medium intensity and you need them to last hours.
customer_reviews.author: Stoneadventures

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids birthday party not as survival tool
customer_reviews.text: Very bright last 12 hours bright white color that's what they say a reality is not bright last about 4 hours the the color is almost orange back looking for something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B

customer_reviews.title: Good...and bad
customer_reviews.text: I got 12 for $12.99. I have used three so far. When you first crack them they are a super bright white for about an hour...then they fade to a pinkish color...about 4 hours later they are a dull orange color. They are very useful for a short duration if that is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Micmaka

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and in good shape and when cracked and shaken they glow and lasted all night. Unfortunately they aren't very bright! With a description like "12 Hour High Intensity Glow Lights" I expected them to be much brighter than they are. I have to use 2 to be bright enough on my kayak to tie on hooks and lures. Not quite what I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: CJones

customer_reviews.title: 12 hour glowsticks
customer_reviews.text: I use these in first aid emergency kits in the car, in bugout bags, and around the house for power outages. These glowsticks are high quality and I will order them again.
customer_reviews.author: consumer999

customer_reviews.title: Just in Case!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these items for “goodie bags” cause I wanted a trinket more functional than junk. Hopefully they will do the job whenever needed. GUESTS thought they were pretty cool, too! I recommend cause it's more purposeful than a candy bar!
customer_reviews.author: AO Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good chem lights, individually packaged too. Will be using them for Search and Rescue for night calls, and keeping them in the car as an alternative to flares for marking a position.
customer_reviews.author: PStrac

customer_reviews.title: Good glowstick!
customer_reviews.text: Light stick is bright and seems to be long lasting. Timing one now to make sure that it lasts the claimed timespan.
customer_reviews.author: MK1Jack

customer_reviews.title: NOT bad
customer_reviews.text: Just not as bright as I had hoped for, although they did have a fairly steady light all night
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Low Light
customer_reviews.text: Not Bright at all. I do not recommend. Just buy the green lights.
customer_reviews.author: FredGderf

customer_reviews.title: Get a different brand
customer_reviews.text: The red does nothing really to be seen on a dark night. Packaged very well so it is strange how bad the quality of the actual product is.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: when you need a little light.
customer_reviews.text: just for fun, to when you are in an emergancy situation. These can be very useful. Get a lot of them to have around the house or in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: does not last long
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our Hurricane kit since we live in south fl. These barely glow and only last 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an emergency kit for my daughter’s school. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mystikstar

customer_reviews.title: Rruly white, & great price
customer_reviews.text: Truly white appearance, great ‘each’ price, arrived fast, illuminates the church w/o the fear of candle flames.
customer_reviews.author: tikosmi

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayak on the river
customer_reviews.text: Did 100mi kayak race on the Sac river this weekend. Didn’t use them, but must have them for the event as a safety precaution. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We use as a night light in the "potty" of our RV camper trailer. Works great, and lasts more than all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P. Carrithers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: A good product at a fair price with fast service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to show how the brightness compares to the white sticks from the same maker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: These glow sticks are the brightest, longest lasting, and best made, on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These glow sticks are heavy duty, and lasted well beyond 24 hours. I still kept the old ones in our tent each night, all of them still had a glow after 48-72 hours! Best glow stick buy EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Treat

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap, they glow, and they last a decent amount of time in the cold. As advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lumasticks
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright and last an amazingly long time. Of course they dim over time, but they really last.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: These barely glow. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: These barely glow. Not something you would use for emergency lighting. I returned my unopened package. They were useless during our power shutdown.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy I. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not correct white - some yellow
customer_reviews.text: I was using these for an End of Year Ceremony and needed white. Half of the sticks were yellow and they didn't have a super bright glow like I hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Tulips

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you need “White”
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lighting and was not white at all. They were actually a blue/purple tint glow.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Lasted longer then thought and yellow seems to be the brightest
customer_reviews.author: jason jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have these around.
customer_reviews.text: They will be used as part of an emergency kit. Nice to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a concert and they were so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! We are keeping on boat for night fishing ☺️
customer_reviews.author: April Elizabeth Crum

customer_reviews.title: Bright and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great product, long lasting light source for a wide variety of uses. I keep some in the house for blackouts, I also put some with my camping equipment just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Wayde Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Good "Generic Light Sticks"
customer_reviews.text: Good (not great) generic "light sticks". The Intensity of the luminicense was much less than expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Adames

product_meta.title: Lumistick 6 Inch Emergency Glow Sticks | 15mm Thick Flat Bottom Illuminating Light Sticks | Kids Safe, Waterproof & Non-Toxic Light Up Neon Sticks for Camping & Hiking
feature_bullets: ➠ 12 PACK OF 6 INCH YELLOW EMERGENCY GLOW STICKS: You will receive Glow Sticks 12 Piece, all carefully packed into our iconic Lumistick cardboard tube. Plenty to go around each glowing glasses bundle will arrive in a Lumistick tube. Keep a reliable source of light on hand with these Lumistick glowsticks. Perfect for emergency situations and surprise blackouts, they will come in handy on a number of different occasions. You can enjoy the vibrant display of colored light trails.

➠ HOOK ON TOP AND FLAT BOTTOM: Our Glow Sticks Contain hanging hooks on one end and bottom steps on others. Hang them anywhere in case of emergency, rescue, camping, haunted houses, running, cycling, music festivals, and concerts or any other occasion, surprise blackouts. Moreover, it is the perfect choice for any other event, whether it is a birthday, dance party, wedding celebration, New Year's Eve, Halloween or others. So, you can easily hang them and stand them anywhere you need to.

➠ HIGH INTENSITY LIGHT FOR UP TO 12 HOURS: Upon activation, the high-intensity light from these big glow sticks can last for up to 12 hours before they start to fade. These are military-grade industrial survival glowsticks that can last from dusk till dawn, making them a perfect companion for emergency situations.

➠ IDEAL GIFT: Fresh out of the factory, these powerful glowsticks have a shelf life of at least two years, which makes them perfect for storing. With strict quality assurance standards, we are able to make sure that the pack of glowsticks each customer receives is fresh and not degraded.

➠ SAFE AND NON-TOXIC: Safety is also one of our main concerns, which is why we use of non-toxic and non-flammable materials for our chem lights. These glow sticks are waterproof and can be used underwater. The outer tube is durable, but if the liquid leaks out, simply wash off skin and clothes with regular soap and water.
